title: The Forgotten Path
goal: Kaelen identifies a specific ancient artifact or ritual crucial to understanding or combating the Shadow Blight.

beats.summary: Deep within the ancient texts, Kaelen deciphers a crucial, long-forgotten passage speaking of the 'Heartstone of Aethel,' a relic of immense power.
The text implies the Heartstone is not merely a weapon, but a key to understanding the true nature of the Shadow Blight and its origins.
Its location is shrouded in riddles, hinting at a perilous journey through forgotten lands and ancient wards, accessible only with specific, arcane knowledge.
